title: Namespace
description: The namespace or unique identifier associated with a collection of data. Each EndUserID is associated with a given namespace. In an Adobe Experience Cloud implementation standard namespaces exist, customer specific ones can be created on request from Adobe support.

xdm:code.title: Code
xdm:code.description: The code is a human readable identifier for a namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.
